song_lyrics: Roj roj ānand thāy, Pramukh Swāmīnā darshane... 1
Trividh tāp dūr thāy, Pramukh Swāmīnā darshane... 2
Antar ūrmi ubharāy, Pramukh Swāmīnā darshane... 3
Nūtan preraṇā chhalakāy, Pramukh Swāmīnā darshane... 4
Pāponā pūnja ṭhelāy, Pramukh Swāmīnā darshane... 5
Utsāh umang relāy, Pramukh Swāmīnā darshane... 6
Duhsah doṣho ghasāy, Pramukh Swāmīnā darshane... 7
Ichchhit kāryo sadhāy, Pramukh Swāmīnā darshane... 8
Nirbaḷ baḷavant thāy, Pramukh Swāmīnā darshane... 9
title: Roj roj ānand thāy Pramukh Swāmīnā darshane

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1114: Sadhu Bhaktipriyadas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
